author: Editorial Team
title: HashKey Capital's Shocking $34M ETH Sale on Binance Unveils Key On-Chain Data
text:
In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency, significant movements on the blockchain often capture immediate attention. Recently, an address suspected to be linked with HashKey Capital executed a truly massive ETH sale , moving millions of dollars worth of Ethereum on Binance. This event highlights the critical role of on-chain data in understanding market dynamics and potential shifts.
What Happened with the HashKey Capital ETH Sale? On-chain analyst @EmberCN recently reported a notable transaction involving an address believed to be connected to HashKey Capital . This address sold a staggering 7,300 ETH, valued at approximately $34.116 million, directly on the Binance exchange. The transaction occurred at a price of $4,673 per ETH, indicating a substantial liquidity event.
Transaction Details: 7,300 ETH sold. Value: $34.116 million USD. Platform: Binance. Price Point: $4,673 per ETH. Interestingly, this significant Binance transaction was preceded by another key move: just three hours earlier, the same address withdrew 34.116 million USDT from Binance. This suggests a strategic sequence of events, where funds were first brought onto the exchange before the large ETH offload.
Decoding the On-Chain Data: Why Does It Matter? Understanding on-chain data is like having a transparent window into the cryptocurrency market. Every transaction on a public blockchain, like Ethereum, is recorded and immutable. Analysts like @EmberCN utilize specialized tools to track these movements, identifying large transfers and connecting them to known entities or patterns. This allows for real-time insights into the activities of major players, often referred to as ‘crypto whales.’
For instance, a large ETH sale from a prominent entity like HashKey Capital can signal various things:
Portfolio Rebalancing: The firm might be adjusting its asset allocation. Profit Taking: Cashing out gains from previous investments. Liquidity Needs: Generating capital for other ventures or operational needs. Market Outlook: Potentially a bearish outlook on Ethereum’s short-term price action, though this is speculative. These large transactions, especially when they involve significant amounts, can sometimes influence market sentiment or even trigger price volatility, making their detection through on-chain data crucial for traders and investors.
Potential Crypto Market Impact from Major Sales When a substantial amount of an asset, such as Ethereum, is sold on a major exchange like Binance, it can create ripples across the crypto market . While a single sale, even one as large as $34 million, might not single-handedly crash the market, it can contribute to selling pressure, especially if other large holders follow suit. The market often reacts to perceived shifts in institutional sentiment.
This particular Binance transaction by a crypto whale movement like HashKey Capital is closely watched because institutional activity often provides insights into broader trends. Retail investors and other market participants often look to these large movements for signals about market direction. It underscores the importance of monitoring not just price charts, but also the underlying blockchain activity.
What This Means for You For everyday crypto enthusiasts and investors, staying informed about such significant on-chain events is key. While you may not replicate a HashKey Capital -sized ETH sale , understanding the motivations and potential impacts of these large transfers can help you make more informed decisions. It reinforces the idea that transparency is a core tenet of blockchain technology, offering unprecedented visibility into market flows.
In conclusion, the recent ETH sale by a HashKey Capital -linked address on Binance is a prime example of how on-chain data provides invaluable insights into the movements of major players. This significant Binance transaction serves as a reminder that monitoring the actions of ‘crypto whales’ is a vital part of navigating the dynamic crypto market , allowing participants to better understand potential shifts and maintain a more comprehensive market perspective.
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is HashKey Capital? HashKey Capital is a prominent crypto asset manager and venture capital firm, focusing on blockchain technology and digital assets. They invest in various crypto projects and protocols.
What does an ‘on-chain analyst’ do? An on-chain analyst studies public blockchain data, such as transaction volumes, wallet addresses, and token movements, to identify trends, predict market behavior, and track the activities of large holders or institutions.
How can a large ETH sale impact the market? A large ETH sale, especially from a significant holder, can increase selling pressure, potentially leading to a temporary price dip. It can also influence market sentiment, causing other investors to reconsider their positions.
What is a ‘crypto whale movement’? A ‘crypto whale movement’ refers to a very large transaction or series of transactions by an individual or entity holding a substantial amount of a particular cryptocurrency, often enough to influence market prices.
Is this a common occurrence in the crypto market? Large transactions by institutional players or wealthy individuals are relatively common in the crypto market. However, their size and the context (e.g., specific exchange, timing) often make them newsworthy and subject to analysis.
Did you find this analysis of the HashKey Capital ETH sale insightful? Share this article with your network on social media to help others understand the fascinating world of on-chain data and its implications for the crypto market!
To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum price action.

author: Australian National Review
title: 12 Benefits of Vinegar and How to Best Use It
text:
From livening up a salad to increasing digestive power, a splash of vinegar has many healing effects.
A splash of vinegar in your cooking enhances flavor and provides a range of health benefits.
Health Benefits of Vinegar Vinegar was used by the Babylonians for cooking, as a preservative, and as a medicine. Today, it is still valued for health and healing.
1. Relieves Fatigue Vinegar can help break down lactic acid buildup in the body, effectively relieving fatigue, restoring energy, and alleviating shoulder and lower back pain.
A randomized clinical trial found that apple cider vinegar functions similarly to sports drinks by reducing lactic acid buildup after endurance exercise, thereby delaying muscle fatigue. 2. Promotes Glucose Metabolism Vinegar can promote calorie burning and boost metabolic rate.
A clinical study published in Nature found that adding a bit of vinegar to foods with a high glycemic index, such as mashed potatoes, can help lower post-meal blood sugar levels in patients with Type 2 diabetes. 3. Reduces Risk of Kidney Stones Regular vinegar consumption can increase the alkalinity of urine, lowering the risk of uric acid stones.
A study published in eBioMedicine indicated that people taking 15 ml of vinegar daily had a lower risk of developing kidney stones. Urine samples showed higher pH levels, lower uric acid and calcium concentrations, and elevated citrate levels—known to suppress kidney stone formation. 4. Supports Digestive Health Vinegar can stimulate gastric acid secretion, thereby boosting appetite and enhancing digestion.
5. Regulates Blood Pressure Apple cider vinegar can promote sodium excretion and improve abnormal sodium metabolism, reducing the risk of hypertension caused by excess salt in the body. Other types of fermented vinegar also have blood pressure-lowering effects.
A 2022 review showed that each 30 ml increase in daily vinegar consumption reduced systolic blood pressure by 3.25 mmHg and diastolic blood pressure by 3.33 mmHg. 6. Lowers cholesterol levels Vinegar can reduce serum cholesterol levels, effectively lowering the risk of arteriosclerosis and heart disease.
A meta-analysis indicated that consuming apple cider vinegar can reduce total serum cholesterol by 6.06 mg/dL. 7. Improves Skin Health Increased levels of lipid peroxides can cause dark spots on the skin, reduce skin elasticity, and lead to wrinkles and sagging. Vinegar can inhibit the production of lipid peroxides, offering beauty and skincare benefits .
8. Eases Hangover Symptoms Vinegar can enhance liver function and help reduce the effects of alcohol.
Related Stories
A 2021 study on mice found that vinegar is rich in polyphenols, which can protect against ethanol-induced liver damage, modulate gut microbiota, and reduce intestinal inflammation. 9. Treats Nail Fungus Vinegar is an excellent antimicrobial agent that can inhibit the growth and reproduction of microorganisms by disrupting their living conditions. For example, soaking hands or feet in a solution of about four fluid ounces of quality vinegar mixed with one liter of water for 20 minutes may help treat fungal nail infections.
10. Stops Hiccups When hiccups become severe, sipping vinegar may help relieve diaphragm spasms that trigger them.
11. Relieves Motion Sickness People with gastrointestinal issues or indigestion are prone to motion sickness and nausea. Drinking a small cup of diluted vinegar water before traveling may help alleviate symptoms of motion sickness.
12. Alleviates Cold Symptoms At the onset of a cold, gargling with a solution of 1 teaspoon of apple cider vinegar and ½ teaspoon of salt in 8 ounces of warm water may help relieve symptoms and speed up recovery.
Precautions for Taking Vinegar Avoid excessive intake: Vinegar is highly acidic, and overconsumption may weaken tendons and soften teeth, according to traditional Chinese medicine (TCM). People with dampness in the spleen and stomach and with muscle weakness should avoid taking vinegar: In TCM, the spleen and stomach are viewed as a system that regulates digestion and metabolism. Symptoms of dampness in this system include bloating after drinking water and sticky stools. People with muscle fatigue, joint stiffness, or early cold symptoms should also avoid taking vinegar. People with stomach ulcers or excessive stomach acid: Those with gastric or duodenal ulcers or those prone to acid reflux are advised to avoid vinegar. Do not use copper cookware for preparation: Vinegar can dissolve copper, potentially leading to copper toxicity if used during cooking. Views expressed in this article are the opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect the views of The Epoch Times. Epoch Health welcomes professional discussion and friendly debate. To submit an opinion piece, please follow these guidelines and submit through our form here. Source link

author: Mauricio Guevara
title: Tesla instala los primeros 'supercargadores' de toda Sudamérica: red de carga revolucionará la movilidad eléctrica
text: Tesla instala los primeros 'supercargadores' de toda Sudamérica: red de carga revolucionará la movilidad eléctrica Este despliegue marca el compromiso de Tesla con la sostenibilidad en América Latina y busca incentivar el uso de vehículos eléctricos a través de una futura tarifa accesible para diferentes marcas. [Tesla instaló sus primeros 'Superchargers'](https://larepublica.pe/mundo/2024/05/18/elon-musk-recontrata-a-su-equipo-de-supercargadores-para-reactivar-el-desarrollo-en-tesla-729360) en Sudamérica, específicamente dentro de un país que destaca por su desarrollo en el transporte eléctrico dentro de toda América Latina. Estos 'supercargadores' cuentan con una capacidad de carga rápida de hasta 250 kW, lo que permite cargar el 80% de la batería en solo 20 minutos. Estas estaciones se encuentran en ciudades claves de esta nación sudamericana, favoreciendo rutas importantes para viajes de larga distancia. La infraestructura marca un hito en la movilidad eléctrica dentro de la región. Recientemente, en un esfuerzo conjunto por promover [la sostenibilidad y la modernización del transporte público](https://larepublica.pe/mundo/2024/10/11/musk-presenta-el-robotaxi-de-tesla-y-promete-que-llegara-al-mercado-en-2027-1010526), este país de América Latina decidió electrificar su sistema de autobuses urbanos. La iniciativa, que se concentrará en la capital, implica la adquisición de 214 autobuses eléctricos de fabricación china. Mediante esta adquisición, la nación latinoamericana ampliará su flota de autobuses eléctricos a aproximadamente 2.500 unidades, afianzándose como la urbe con el mayor número de estos vehículos fuera del territorio chino. Tesla instala 'Superchargers' en Sudamérica Tesla inició la operación de los primeros 'Superchargers' en Sudamérica, ubicados en Chile, marcando un [ hito para la movilidad eléctrica en la región](https://larepublica.pe/estados-unidos/2024/10/11/sera-el-cibertaxi-de-tesla-el-futuro-del-transporte-elon-musk-presenta-el-cybercab-en-un-evento-en-estados-unidos-lrtmus-194535). Los puntos de carga están en Arauco Premium Outlet Buenaventura (Quilicura) y Arauco Premium Outlet Curauma (Valparaíso), donde los usuarios de Tesla podrán cargar sus vehículos con una potencia de hasta 250 kW, permitiendo alcanzar el 80% de la batería en 20 minutos. PUEDES VER: [La potencia mundial que superaría a Rusia, China y Brasil con la mayor exportación de petróleo crudo en 2050] Tesla comenzó la operación de los primeros 'Superchargers' en Sudamérica, ubicados en Chile. Foto: RutaMotor. En total se instalaron ocho estaciones de carga, y aunque actualmente el servicio es gratuito para autos Tesla, en el futuro se habilitará para otras marcas con tarifas accesibles. Estos 'Superchargers' están diseñados para facilitar viajes de larga distancia a través de rutas clave entre las regiones de Valparaíso y la Metropolitana, con planes de expansión en el futuro. Además, esta iniciativa es un reflejo del compromiso de Tesla con la sostenibilidad y la reducción de la dependencia de combustibles fósiles, alineando a Chile con el objetivo global de adopción de vehículos eléctricos. El [despliegue de esta tecnología también posiciona a Chile ](https://larepublica.pe/mundo/2024/09/02/el-pais-de-america-latina-que-revoluciona-el-trasporte-publico-con-autobuses-electricos-el-mas-sostenible-de-la-region-chile-174060)como un líder en Sudamérica en infraestructura de carga rápida, algo esencial para el crecimiento del mercado de autos eléctricos en el continente. Cabe indicar que Tesla proyecta continuar expandiendo la red en el país y la región, lo que incentivará la adopción de autos eléctricos y mejorará la experiencia de los conductores al eliminar la ansiedad relacionada con la autonomía de los vehículos. Este proyecto también busca fomentar la inversión en movilidad sostenible y atraer más interés en la transición energética dentro de América Latina, donde Chile ya destaca. ¿Cuál es el plan de Tesla dentro de Chile? Tesla tiene un plan ambicioso para desplegar una red de supercargadores en Chile durante los próximos dos años, con estaciones ubicadas cada 150 a 200 kilómetros. Este diseño permitirá a los usuarios realizar viajes de larga distancia sin preocuparse por la autonomía de sus vehículos eléctricos. Durante un período inicial, el uso será completamente gratuito, brindando una ventaja a los propietarios de Tesla. Más adelante, se implementará una tarifa de mercado que podrá gestionarse a través de la aplicación de Tesla, que facilita el seguimiento del consumo y los pagos. PUEDES VER: [El megaproyecto que conectará 2 océanos y 3 continentes con un enorme corredor: será clave para EE. UU. y México en 2025] Actualmente, Tesla cuenta con más de 50.000 supercargadores a nivel mundial, consolidándose como la red de carga rápida más extensa y confiable. Esta expansión en Chile no solo busca facilitar la adopción de vehículos eléctricos, sino también alinearse con los objetivos gubernamentales de sostenibilidad. Al abrir la red a otras marcas de autos eléctricos en el futuro, Tesla pretende impulsar la transición hacia la movilidad eléctrica en el país. En total se instalaron ocho estaciones de carga, y aunque actualmente el servicio es gratuito para autos Tesla. Foto: G5 noticias. El país de América Latina con más autobuses eléctricos La incorporación de a [utobuses eléctricos provenientes de China ](https://larepublica.pe/mundo/2024/03/31/el-unico-pais-de-sudamerica-con-transporte-publico-electrico-de-2-pisos-la-segunda-flota-mas-grande-chile-1518504)y otros países ha posicionado a Santiago de Chile como un referente en innovación y sostenibilidad en América Latina, situándola a la par de metrópolis globales como Londres y Hong Kong en términos de infraestructura de transporte público. El proyecto, liderado por el Ministerio de Transportes y Telecomunicaciones (MTT) junto a compañías tecnológicas del sector privado, demuestra un firme compromiso con la modernización del transporte y la disminución de emisiones en la región. "Nuestra ciudad, Santiago de Chile, sigue posicionándose a la vanguardia en movilidad de transporte público urbano", afirmó Juan Carlos Muñoz, ministro del MTT. Chile se consolida como líder en innovación y sostenibilidad en América Latina. Foto: Enel X. Chile está experimentando una verdadera revolución en su sistema de transporte público dentro de América Latina con la implementación masiva de autobuses eléctricos, consolidando a Santiago como un líder global en movilidad sostenible dentro de la región. Recientemente, la capital chilena anunció la sustitución de 214 autobuses diésel por modelos eléctricos del fabricante chino Yutong.

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Inspired Brighton survive late drama to dent Tottenham’s top-four hopes
text: Tottenham Hotspur ’s Premier League revival was halted in emphatic fashion after two Joao Pedro penalties and a stunning strike from Pervis Estupinan helped injury-hit Brighton and Hove Albion record a thumping 4-2 win. Spurs arrived at the Amex Stadium seeking a fourth successive top-flight success to reclaim fourth spot from reigning champions Manchester City. But the north London club were ripped apart as Pedro’s double and Estupinan’s thunderbolt added to Jack Hinshelwood’s opener. Tottenham, who claimed late consolations through substitute Alejo Veliz and Ben Davies, could easily have lost by more as rampant Albion twice hit the woodwork and had a Facundo Buonanotte effort disallowed. Richarlison struck a post for the visitors and was twice denied by the offside flag, while Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg also hit the woodwork late on. Yet, on this evidence, Champions League qualification looks a distant dream for Ange Postecoglou ’s side, who had registered just one point from 15 before their recent upturn in form. Victory lifts Roberto De Zerbi ’s hosts above Newcastle into eighth. Depleted Brighton were missing eight first-team players while their visitors also had a lengthy list of absentees. One-time Arsenal forward Danny Welbeck should have opened the scoring for Albion inside six minutes when he was twice denied by goalkeeper Guglielmo Vicario, but the Seagulls deservedly edged ahead with 11 minutes on the clock. Tottenham’s porous defence failed to halt Pedro’s mazy waltz across the 18-yard box and his offload was emphatically dispatched into the roof of the net by 18-year-old defender Hinshelwood. Brazilian forward Pedro duly doubled the lead with a spot-kick awarded following VAR intervention. Spurs thought they had escaped when Jan Paul van Hecke’s header from a Pascal Gross corner came back off the right post but replays showed Dejan Kulusevski pulled down Welbeck as he attempted to reach the rebound and Pedro coolly rolled home from 12 yards. Stunned Spurs showed little response and were in danger of falling further behind. James Milner rattled the right post with a superb curling effort before Buonanotte’s clinical finish was flagged offside. The away side almost gifted Brighton a third when Pedro was sent through by a calamitous back-pass from Pedro Porro, only to see his attempted dink pushed wide by Vicario. Postecoglou would undoubtedly have been happy to reach the break only two behind, albeit his side’s predicament nearly improved as Richarlison swept against the outside of the left post in added time. The Brazilian then put the ball in the net having already been ruled offside and then curled wide before again being denied by the flag of assistant referee Darren Cann. Tottenham’s frustration was quickly compounded. Seagulls substitute Estupinan, making his first appearance since November 9 due to injury, did the damage, unleashing a thunderous, dipping effort into the top right corner from around 25 yards following Milner’s short corner. Tormentor-in-chief Pedro rubbed salt into Spurs’ wounds 15 minutes from time by dispatching his second penalty after Evan Ferguson was brought down by Giovani Lo Celso. Veliz’s first goal in English football, after Kulusevski and Son Heung-min capitalised on sloppy Seagulls defending, eased the embarrassment before Davies’ header from a Porro cross increased the anxiety among home fans. But Brighton weathered a frantic nine minutes of added time, during which Hojbjerg hit the base of the right post, to claim the points.
